name: Sheep'n'Poetry
description:
Sheep'n'Poetry

Idea, design & code by Torsten Hartmann, Music by MrMusicalLion

How to Play
- Type the letters shown on the sheeps from left to right.
- Missed letters make you count a sheep.
- Don't count to many sheeps or you will fall asleep.

Thoughts
I always wanted to make a game with sheeps. As a kid, I used to play at my grandparents farm. There were a lot of farm animals including a bunch of sheeps. After my grandparents passed away the sheeps still remained on the meadow. Somehow they were forgotten until a few weeks later in the summer. I remember seeing a bunch of sheeps on a hot summer day gathered in the shadow of a nearby broken shack. I don't know, what became of them. I guess mutton chops is a possibility. Whatever. This game is dedicated to the poor sheep. And to poetry.
